verses.verse: <S%H428>These<s%> be the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> in the <S%H6160>plain<s%> <S%H4136>over<s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H5489>Red<s%> sea, <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H6290>Paran,<s%> and <S%H8603>Tophel,<s%> and <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> and <S%H2698>Hazeroth,<s%> and <S%H1774>Dizahab.<s%>
(There are <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> journey from <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> to <S%H6947>Kadeshbarnea.<s%>)

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had given him in <S%H6680>commandment<s%> to them;

<S%H310>After<s%> he had <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> at <S%H6252>Astaroth<s%> in <S%H154>Edrei:<s%>

<S%H5921>On<s%> this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H2974>began<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H874>declare<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to us in <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> You have <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H7227>long<s%> enough in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mount:<s%>

<S%H6437>Turn<s%> you, and take your <S%H5265>journey,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the places <S%H7934>near<s%> thereunto, in the <S%H6160>plain,<s%> in the <S%H2022>hills,<s%> and in the <S%H8219>vale,<s%> and in the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and by the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2348>side,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and to <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%>

<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you: <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to them and to their <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them.
And I <S%H559>spoke<s%> to you at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> you myself <S%H905>alone:<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> you, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you are this <S%H3117>day<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>

(The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5674>make<s%> you a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> so many <S%H3254>more<s%> as you are, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, as he has <S%H1696>promised<s%> you!)
<S%H349>How<s%> can I myself <S%H905>alone<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H2960>cumbrance,<s%> and your <S%H4853>burden,<s%> and your <S%H7379>strife?<s%>

<S%H3051>Take<s%> you <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H995>understanding,<s%> and <S%H3045>known<s%> among your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> them <S%H7218>rulers<s%> over you.
And you <S%H6030>answered<s%> me, and <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> for us to <S%H6213>do.<s%>

So I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H3045>known,<s%> and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H2572>fifties,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H6235>tens,<s%> and <S%H7860>officers<s%> among your <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>

And I <S%H6680>charged<s%> your <S%H8199>judges<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the causes <S%H996>between<s%> your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>righteously<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is with him.

You shall not <S%H5234>respect<s%> <S%H6440>persons<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> but you shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6996>small<s%> as well as the <S%H1419>great;<s%> you shall not be <S%H1481>afraid<s%> of the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H376>man;<s%> for the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is <S%H430>God's:<s%> and the <S%H1697>cause<s%> that is too <S%H7185>hard<s%> for you, <S%H7126>bring<s%> it to me, and I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> it.
And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you should <S%H6213>do.<s%>

And when we <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> we <S%H3212>went<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us; and we <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6947>Kadeshbarnea.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said<s%> to you, You are <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> does <S%H5414>give<s%> to us.

<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you: <S%H5927>go<s%> up and <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> has <S%H1696>said<s%> to you; <S%H3372>fear<s%> not, <S%H408>neither<s%> be <S%H2865>discouraged.<s%>

And you <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to me <S%H3605>every<s%> one of you, and <S%H559>said,<s%> We will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us, and they shall <S%H2658>search<s%> us out the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H7725>bring<s%> us <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> by <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> we must <S%H5927>go<s%> up, and into <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> we shall <S%H935>come.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>saying<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> me well: and I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of you, <S%H259>one<s%> of a <S%H7626>tribe:<s%>
And they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up into the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and <S%H7270>searched<s%> it out.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> in their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H3381>brought<s%> it <S%H3381>down<s%> to us, and <S%H7725>brought<s%> us <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> It is a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> does <S%H5414>give<s%> us.
Notwithstanding you <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H5927>go<s%> up, but <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%>

And you <S%H7279>murmured<s%> in your <S%H168>tents,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8135>hated<s%> us, he has <S%H3318>brought<s%> us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> us.

<S%H575>Where<s%> shall we <S%H5927>go<s%> up? our <S%H251>brothers<s%> have <S%H4549>discouraged<s%> our <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H7311>taller<s%> than we; the <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H1219>walled<s%> up to <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and <S%H1571>moreover<s%> we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
Then I <S%H559>said<s%> to you, <S%H6206>Dread<s%> not, <S%H3808>neither<s%> be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> which <S%H1980>goes<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, he shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> for you, according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H6213>did<s%> for you in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes;<s%>

And in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> how that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5375>bore<s%> you, as a <S%H376>man<s%> does <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> that you <S%H1980>went,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>into<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>
Yet in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> you did not <S%H539>believe<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%>

Who <S%H1980>went<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, to <S%H8446>search<s%> you out a <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H2583>pitch<s%> your tents in, in <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> to <S%H7200>show<s%> you by <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> you should <S%H3212>go,<s%> and in a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H1697>words,<s%> and was <S%H7107>wroth,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H518>Surely<s%> there shall not <S%H376>one<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H2108>Save<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh;<s%> he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and to him will I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> that he has <S%H1869>trodden<s%> on, and to his <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he has <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H1571>Also<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with me for your <S%H1558>sakes,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> You also shall not <S%H935>go<s%> in <S%H8033>thither.<s%>

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> which <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, he shall <S%H935>go<s%> in <S%H8033>thither:<s%> <S%H2388>encourage<s%> him: for he shall cause <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> it.

Moreover your <S%H2945>little<s%> ones, <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H559>said<s%> should be a <S%H957>prey,<s%> and your <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> had <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> between <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil,<s%> they shall <S%H935>go<s%> in <S%H8033>thither,<s%> and to them will I <S%H5414>give<s%> it, and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.
But as for you, <S%H6437>turn<s%> you, and take your <S%H5265>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

Then you <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> we will <S%H5927>go<s%> up and <S%H3898>fight,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us. And when you had <S%H2296>girded<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> you were <S%H1951>ready<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up into the <S%H2022>hill.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H559>Say<s%> to them. <S%H5927>Go<s%> not up, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3898>fight;<s%> for I am not <S%H7130>among<s%> you; <S%H3808>lest<s%> you be <S%H5062>smitten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

So I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you; and you would not <S%H8085>hear,<s%> but <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> <S%H2102>presumptuously<s%> up into the <S%H2022>hill.<s%>

And the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in that <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out <S%H7125>against<s%> you, and <S%H7291>chased<s%> you, as <S%H1682>bees<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H3807>destroyed<s%> you in <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> even to <S%H2767>Hormah.<s%>

And you <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> would not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> give <S%H238>ear<s%> to you.
So you <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> according to the <S%H3117>days<s%> that you <S%H3427>stayed<s%> there.
